Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Revisore per Philosophy & Technology, Springer (http://www.springer.com/philosophy/epis temology+and+philosophy+of+science/journ al/13347)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Submitted talk (con Guglielmo Tamburrini): “Model Checking and Models in Science. Models, Regularities, Prediction.”, 7th European Conference on Philosophy and Computing (ECAP09) - 2-4 luglio 2009, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona.

Submitted talk: “Model Checking and scientific methodology: models, regularities, and idealizations”, International Conference of the Italian Society for Logic and Philosophy of Science (SILFS 2010) –15 - 17 dicembre 2010, Università degli Studi di Bergamo.

Submitted talk: “Falsification and confirmation of hypotheses about computational systems in software testing”, 14th congress of logic, methodology and philosophy of science (CLMPS11) - 19-26 luglio, University of Nancy.

Submitted talk: “Model Based Abductive Reasoning in Software Verification”, MBR012 Model-Based Reasoning in Science and Technology. Theoretical and Cognitive Issues, - 21-23 giugno 2012, Sestri Levante, Italy.

Submitted Talk: "Faslifiability and Probability of Hypotheses about Computational Systems, and Scientific Experiments in Software Testing"; The Answers of Philosophy: SIFA 20th Anniversary Conference. 12-15 September 2012, Alghero (Università degli Studi di Sassari).
Menbro del Program committee nel congresso internazionale PhiloWeb 2014, 31 maggio 2014, Salonicco, Grecia.

Submitted talk (con Petros Stefaneas) "The Logical Structure of Modular Semantic Theories of Software Systems", IACAP 2014, The Annual Meeting of the International Association for Computing and Philosophy, 2-4 luglio, Salonicco, Grecia

Invited Speaker al Workshop ‘Induction, abduction, belief revision, and realism’. National Technical University of Athens; School of Applied Mathematics and Physics; Department of Humanities, Social Sciences and Law. Research Funding Program: THALIS - UoA, 16-17 dicembre 2014, Atene, Grecia. Titolo Intervento :"Semantic Theories of Software Systems. Modularity, Discovery, and Justification"
Co-organizzatore (con Petros Stefaneas) del Workshop "Philosophy of Computer Science", presso il congresso UNILOG,2015, 5th World Congress and School on Universal Logic, 25-30 giugno 2015, Istanbul

Submitted talk (con Petros Stefaneas): "Defending the Semantic View of Theories. A Computer Science Perspective", 15th Congress on Logic, Methodology and Philosophy of Science (CLMPS), Helsinki, 3-8 agosto 2015.

Invited speaker al congresso HaPoC 2015 : 3rd International CONFERENCE on the HISTORY and PHILOSOPHY of COMPUTING, 8-11 ottobre 2015, Pisa. Titolo Intervento: "Functions, Abstractions and Idealizations in the Explanation of Computing Systems Behaviour"

Co-organizzatore (con Giuseppe Primiero e Petros Stefaneas) del Simposio "Methodological issues in the Philosophy of Computer Science" presso IACAP 2016: International Association for Computing and Philosophy, Annual Meeting, 14-17 giugno 2016, Ferrara.

Submitted talk (con Guglielmo Tamburrini): "From Simulative Programs as Theories to Theories of Simulative Programs", IACAP 2016: International Association for Computing and Philosophy, Annual Meeting, 14-17 giugno 2016, Ferrara.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Collaboratore esterno del gruppo di ricerca 'Logic and Formal Methods Research Group (λ-ForM)' (http://fsvg.math.ntua.gr/people.html), Department of Mathematics, School of Applied Mathematical and Physical Sciences, National Technical University of Athens.

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Invited Visiting Researcher, University of Essex (UK), School of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering. Program on the 'Philosophy of Computer Science'.
